name: rug_gen.tic
description:
My first interactive TIC-80 piece. 

Controls:
- left click (or tap) to generate a new pattern
- hold right click to animate, via palette swap

Source Code (Lua):
r=math.random
for a=0x03FC0,0x03FF0 do poke(a,r(256))end
cls()c=r(4,99)t=0
function TIC()_,_,lm,_,rm,_,_=mouse()if lm then reset() end
for x=1,241 do for y=1,137 do pix(x,y,(x*y%c)-t)end
end
t=t+1if not rm then t=0 end
end
